name: Cream of Raspberries And Yogurt
keywords: dessert, gluten-free, low calorie, low cholesterol, low-fat, low-sodium, nut-free, vegetarian, raspberries, sugar, yogurt
recipeIngredient: 2 pints (about 1 1/2 pounds) ripe raspberries (4 cups), washed and patted dry with with paper towel

recipeInstructions.text: Place half the berries (2 cups) in a food processor with the yogurt and sugar. Process until very smooth. (If desired, push mixture through a fine-screened sieve or food mill to remove small seeds.)
Combine remaining berries with sauce, and refrigerate (for up to 6 hours) until serving time. Divide among 6 dessert dishes, and serve.
